ad_text: Pro-Vac Sponsored We're GROWING and looking for the best talent! Top industry pay + great benefits. You will maintain our expansive fleet (including the largest Vac-Con fleet in the PNW!) so that we can continue providing quality environmental services to our community. Every day, you will organize your work orders based on priority, critically analyze each issue, and independently troubleshoot in a fast-paced environment. To thrive in this shop, you must have experience working with heavy equipment, be a creative and independent problem-solver, and be eager to learn and grow with the company. If this sounds like you, apply today! Depending on experience and prevailing wage opportunities, our mechanics earn a base pay starting at $32-40/HR with OT available. THE BENEFITS: * Work in one of the largest in-house equipment repair shops in Washington state! * Employer Paid Benefits (Medical, LTD, Life, EAP) * Paid Vacation Leave * Sick & Safe Leave * 401(k) with a up to 4%company match * Free gym membership & other local employee discounts THE LOCATION: Puyallup, WA

Pro-Vac Sponsored We're GROWING and looking for the best talent! Top industry pay + great benefits. You will maintain our expansive fleet (including the largest Vac-Con fleet in the PNW!) so that we can continue providing quality environmental services to our community. Every day, you will organize your work orders based on priority, critically analyze each issue, and independently troubleshoot in a fast-paced environment. To thrive in this shop, you must have experience working with heavy equipment, be a creative and independent problem-solver, and be eager to learn and grow with the company. If this sounds like you, apply today! Depending on experience and prevailing wage opportunities, our mechanics earn a base pay starting at $32-40/HR with OT available. THE BENEFITS: * Work in one of the largest in-house equipment repair shops in Washington state! * Employer Paid Benefits (Medical, LTD, Life, EAP) * Paid Vacation Leave * Sick & Safe Leave * 401(k) with a up to 4%company match * Free gym membership & other local employee discounts THE LOCATION: Puyallup, WA

Pro-Vac Sponsored Top Industry Pay + Great Benefits. You will work with the largest Vac-Con fleet in the U.S to bring sustainable environmental services to our communities. Every day, you will travel somewhere new, build relationships with current and potential clients, and receive comprehensive training to be the best in the industry. To thrive in this job, you must demonstrate excellent customer service, be a self-motivated “go-getter”, and an efficient problem-solver. If this sounds like you, apply today! THE POSITION: We’re looking for a Class A or B CDL Driver with tanker and air brake endorsements to operate Vac Trucks. Depending on experience and prevailing wage opportunities, our drivers have the opportunity to earn $70,000 - $100,000 per year. THE BENEFITS: * Employer Paid Benefits (Medical, Vision, LTD, Life, EAP) * Sick & Safe Leave * 401(k) with up to 4% company match * In-house training by our Field Training Coordinator * Free gym membership & local employee discounts * Work with a great TEAM! REQUIREMENTS: * Must have valid Class A or B CDL with Tanker & Air Brake endorsements * A record of safe vehicle operation * Must be able to lift 80lbs and perform physical activities THE LOCATION: Woodinville, WA
